title: Fertility rate in Brazil
yAxis: Number of children born per woman
summary: Overall Number of children born per woman has decreased over the Year.
Number of children born per woman is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2012, and finally roughly constant from 2012 to 2014.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Number of children born per woman, of value 1.85 was reached at Year 2008
The lowest Number of children born per woman, of value 1.76 was reported at Year 2013, and 2014
min_summary: In general Number of children born per woman has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of children born per woman is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2012, and finally roughly constant from 2012 to 2014.
